data.name: Kree Reaper
data.description: A vicious hunter who doesn't give her prey a chance to recover.

starItems.name: Kree Reaper
starItems.description: A vicious hunter who doesn't give her prey a chance to recover.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>430%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>540%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>540%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
On Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color> ally.

2.description:
On Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color> ally.

3.description:
On Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies

4.description:
On Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of Max Health and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color> ally.

5.description:
On Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of Max Health and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color> ally.
